articles.title: Newcastle taken to replay by 3rd-tier Rochdale in FA Cup
articles.description: Newcastle has been taken to a replay by third-tier Rochdale in the third round of the FA Cup to continue its poor recent record in the world’s oldest club knockout competition
articles.content:
Miguel Almiron gave Newcastle a 17th-minute lead with his second goal in two weeks, the Paraguay playmaker having gone his first 11 months at the northeast club without scoring.

articles.title: Why more kids are learning — and enjoying — yoga - The Washington Post
articles.description: Just like with adults, the discipline improves flexibility, balance, strength and cardiovascular health. It also provides mental and emotional benefits.

articles.author: Thomas M. Boswell
articles.title: Age before beauty? For these Nats, age is beauty.
articles.description: In signing reliever Will Harris and chasing third baseman Josh Donaldson, team shows its willing to spend on quality — not matter how old it is. And landing Donaldson is the key.
articles.content: One was Houston reliever Will Harris, who has a spectacular 2.36 ERA over the past five seasons. The Nats signed him Thursday for $24 million for three years. They made me a priority from the beginning, said Harris, who had a 1.50 ERA in 68 games last season … [+6561 chars]

articles.title: Iran general steps out of Soleimani's shadow to lead proxies
articles.description: A new Iranian general is stepping out of the shadows to lead the country's elite Quds Force after the U.S. killed its previous head, Qassem Soleimani
articles.content:
Like his predecessor, a young Esmail Ghaani faced the carnage of Irans eight-year war with Iraq in the 1980s and later joined the newly founded Quds, or Jerusalem, Force.
